abilities.name: Imperial Law
abilities.rule: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent‚Äôs army. Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets that unit, that attack has the **[LETHAL HITS]** and **[PRECISION]** abilities.

abilities.name: Nuncio-acquila
abilities.rule:
Once per battle, at the start of any Command phase, you can select one objective marker within 6‚Äù of the bearer. All enemy units (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**) within range of that objective marker must take a Battle‚Äêshock test. Each objective marker can only be targeted by this ability once per turn.

***Designer‚Äôs Note**: Place one Nuncio‚Äêaquila token next to the bearer, removing it once it uses this ability.*

abilities.name: Soulguilt Scanner
abilities.rule: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer‚Äôs unit have the **[IGNORES COVER]** ability.

abilities.name: Arbites Medi-kit
abilities.rule: At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer‚Äôs unit is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Exaction Vigilants to this unit.

wargear_options: ‚ñ† The Proctor-Exactant can be equipped with 1 nuncio aquila.
* That model‚Äôs Arbites combat shotgun cannot be replaced.
‚ñ† 1 other Exaction Vigilant that is equipped with an Arbites combat shotgun can be equipped with 1 Arbites medi-kit.*
‚ñ† 1 other Exaction Vigilant that is equipped with an Arbites combat shotgun can be equipped with 1 soulguilt scanner.*
